hanzi-su-wiki:
誰

Значения

Кто

Мнемоника

Птичий 隹 гомон 言. Куры плохо различают людей и поднимают шум от любого вошедшего.

Варианты

谁

koohiiStory1: Do you remember that song where they say "Who let the turkeys out!? Gobble.. gobble.. gobble"?
koohiiStory2: [who; someone; somebody] You´re alone when, suddenly, you think you hear someone speaking. "Who´s there?", you say, but there is no answer. Then you find out it was only a turkey gobbling. You feel relieved (and ashamed to tell this story). (Based on raulir).

WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Then, someone says turkey. "Who said turkey? You? How dare (だれ) you."
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You're so mad at that person even though you demanded someone say turkey.

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the little bird (隹) is making words (言), but who for?
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If a turkey asks you where his friend is you will not understand his gobble talk and ask 'who?' lots of times.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription from " words ", "隹" sound, the original meaning is dark horse. The word " who " of the Dading Ding is slightly changed. It is pronounced "骓", "Shuowen": "骓, the horse is dark and black."

It is used as the original meaning in the inscriptions to indicate that the " who " of the person is written as "隹". Zhongshan Wangding: "The falcon can do it?" That is, "Who can do it." It can be seen that "隹" is an ancient word for " who ", followed by "言". "Shuowen": "Who, so what. From the sound of words."

" Who " was later generally used as a pronoun to denote a certain person, such as Du Fu in the Tang Dynasty "Du Juan Xing": "No one can predict the change of the sky, and everything will be repeated." Birds and beasts should not be in the same group, but who are we who are the followers of the Feth?"
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from " yan ", "隹" sound, the original meaning is dark horse.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「言」，「隹」聲，本義為黑馬。大鼎「誰」字言旁稍有訛變，讀作「騅」，《說文》：「騅，馬蒼黑雜毛。」

　　金文中用作本義，表示誰人的「誰」寫作「隹」，中山王鼎：「其隹能之？」即「其誰能之」。可見「隹」是「誰」的古字，後加注「言」旁。《說文》：「誰，何也。从言隹聲。」

　　「誰」後來一般用作代詞，表示某個人，如唐代杜甫〈杜鵑行〉：「蒼天變化誰料得，萬事反覆何所無」；亦表示某物，如《論語·微子》：「鳥獸不可與同群，吾非斯人之徒與而誰與？」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「言」，「隹」聲，本義為黑馬。

誰(たれ): adjectival suffix for a person
誰(だれ): who
誰か(だれか): someone, somebody

金文從「 言 」，「 隹 」聲，本義為黑馬。大鼎「 誰 」字言旁稍有訛變，讀作「 騅 」，《說文》：「騅，馬蒼黑雜毛。」 金文中用作本義，表示誰人的「 誰 」寫作「 隹 」，中山王鼎：「其隹能之？」即「其誰能之」。可見「 隹 」是「 誰 」的古字，後加注「 言 」旁。《說文》：「誰，何也。从言隹聲。」 「 誰 」後來一般用作代詞，表示某個人，如唐代杜甫〈杜鵑行〉：「蒼天變化誰料得，萬事反覆何所無」；亦表示某物，如《論語·微子》：「鳥獸不可與同群，吾非斯人之徒與而誰與？」
Bronze inscription from " words", " 隹" sound, the original meaning is dark horse. The word " who" of the Dading Ding is slightly changed. It is pronounced " 骓", "Shuowen": "骓, the horse is dark and black." It is used as the original meaning in the inscriptions to indicate that the " who" of the person is written as " 隹". Zhongshan Wangding: "The falcon can do it?" That is, "Who can do it." It can be seen that " 隹" is an ancient word for " who", followed by " 言". "Shuowen": "Who, so what. From the sound of words." " Who" was later generally used as a pronoun to denote a certain person, such as Du Fu in the Tang Dynasty "Du Juan Xing": "No one can predict the change of the sky, and everything will be repeated." Birds and beasts should not be in the same group, but who are we who are the followers of the Feth?"

誰字的基本解释

誰
shuí

誰
shéi
见“谁”。

誰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuí］［shéi］
［《廣韻》視隹切，平脂，禪。］
“谁1”的繁体字。
(1)疑问代词。相当于“何”、“什么”。
(2)疑问代词。相当于“哪个”、“什么人”。
(3)副词。相当于“难道”、“哪”。表示反问。
(4)发语词。
(5)通“推”。推举选择。
(6)姓。明朝有谁龙。见《万姓统谱》。

誰字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誰； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1165第11
【五音集韻】是爲切【玉篇】是推切，?音垂。【說文】何也。【玉篇】不知其名也。【易·同人】出門同人。又誰咎也。【詩·召南】誰其尸之，有齊季女。【左傳·隱元年】其誰曰不然。【老子·道德經】吾不知誰之子。【莊子·天運篇】子生，五月而能言，不至乎孩而始誰。【註】未至孩童，便知人之姓名爲誰。　又【爾雅·釋訓】誰昔昔也。【詩·國風】誰昔然矣。【傳】猶言疇昔也。郭璞曰：誰，發語辭。　又【正韻】誰何，詰問也。【前漢·賈誼傳】?利兵而誰何。【師古註】問之爲誰也。　又【前漢·五行志】大誰卒。【師古註】主問非常之人，云姓名是誰也。大誰，本以誰何稱，因用名官，有大誰長。卒者，長所領士卒也。　又姓。【萬姓統譜】誰龍，明正德閒九江府照磨。　又【讀書通】通作孰，引《莊子·列禦?》莫覺莫悟，何相孰也。又通作疇。引《書·舜典》疇若予上下草木鳥獸，卽孰若，?與誰同。　又【韻會】亦作譙。【史記·衞綰傳】不譙呵綰。【註】責讓也。譙，音誰，呵，音何。【漢書】作孰何。李奇曰：孰誰也。何，

Who
Basic explanation of words
Who
shuí

See "who".
Who
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shuí］［shéi］
["Guangyun" Seeing falcon cutting, Pingzhi, Zen. ]
"Who 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Interrogative pronouns. It is equivalent to "He" and "What".
(2) Interrogative pronouns. It is equivalent to "Which" and "Who".
(3) Adverbs. It is equivalent to "Isn't it" or "Which". Indicates a rhetorical question.
(4) Spoken words.
(5) Through "push". Recommend choices.
(6) Last name. Who is the dragon in the Ming Dynasty? See "The Genealogy of Wan Xing".
Who
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　Who; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: 1165-11
[Five Yinjiyun] is for cutting [Jade chapter] is for pushing and cutting,? Yin Chu. [Said the text] What is it? [Jade articles] I don’t know its name. 【Yi·Fangren】Going out as a fellow. Who is to blame. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】Whoever owns the corpse, there is Qi Ji female. [Zuo Zhuan·Yin Yuan] Whoever said otherwise. 【Laozi·Tao Te Jing】I don’t know who’s son. [Zhuangzi·Tianyun Chapter] A child born in May is able to speak, and it doesn't matter who is born as a child. [Note] You will know who the name of the person is before you reach a child.　[Erya·Shixun] Who is the same. 【Poetry·National Style】Who used to be. [Biography] Still talking about the past. Guo Pu said: Who, speak.　[Zhengyun] Who is who, I can ask questions. [Previous Han·Jia Yi Biography]? [Shigu Note] Who is it for?　[Former Han·Five Elements] Who will die? [Shigu's Note] The Lord asked the very person who is Yun's name. Who is the greatest, who is originally called, because of the name official, whoever grows older. The pawns are also the leaders of the elders.　Another last name. [Wan Xing Genealogy] Who is the dragon, Ming Zhengde leisurely Jiujiang Mansion Zhaomo.　 Also [Reading Master] is a master, quoted from "Zhuangzi·Leiyu?" Also pass as a domain. Quoting "Book of Shun Code", if you go up and down the grass, trees, birds and beasts, who are you? With whom.　[Rhyme Club] also makes a mistake. 【Historical Records·Biography of Wei Wan】Don't Qiao Ha Wan. [Note] Responsibility also. Qiao, who is the sound, huh, what is the sound. [Hanshu] What is it for? Li Qi said: Who is it? what,

Radicals: 言, 隹  (say, turkey)
Meaning Mnemonic
Who will say turkey? Who? WHO???
Say "who" over and over again, demanding someone says "turkey," for some reason.
Reading Mnemonic
Then, someone says turkey. "Who said turkey? You? How dare (だれ) you."
You're so mad at that person even though you demanded someone say turkey.
